biotools.summary:
Enabling systems immunology with a manually curated intercellular immune interaction network.

ImmunoGlobe is a map of the immune network that describes how different parts of the immune system work together to drive immune responses. By structuring our knowledge of immune interactions into a directed graph, ImmunoGlobe makes it easy to explore the relationships between components of the immune system.
